ggplot practice
===============
        
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(datasets)
head(diamonds)
head(mtcars)

## qplot
qplot(clarity,data=diamonds,fill=cut,geom="bar")

## ggplot histogram
ggplot(diamonds,aes(clarity,fill=cut))+geom_bar()

```
